matchDesiredStats: Synchronization: the desired stats are displayed in the found builds
unmatchDesiredStats: Dissociation: the stats displayed in the builds are independent
resetSettingsText: Do you really want to reset settings?
deleteAllBuildsInMemoryText: Do you really want to delete all saved builds?
appliedOnMountForSetBuilderAndComparator: Applied on mount for Build finder and Comparator
tutoImportation: Copy the text, go to 'Collection', and click the 'Import' (clipboard) button.
